ComicInfo.Summary: Horridus, whose parents committed suicide, enters the Police Academy. Mrs. Darling is injured in an "accident". Dragon and Dart rescue Barbaric and Ricochet from Cesspool. Barbaric and Ricochet join the force. Debbie's mother is questioned. Ricochet meets Rapture, who's forced to kill her ex-pimp.

ComicInfo.Title: The Coming of Freak Force; Rapture's Revenge
